Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Egg Festival - Sam/Sebastian dead

Entries.Abigail: I hope the competition will be a little more fierce this year.#$b#I mean, Magnus is a wizard, so I'm guessing he'll be tough, right?$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Egg Festival - Gus dead

Entries.Demetrius: The buffet is pretty spectacular this year. Are any of the eggs in there from your farm?

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Egg Festival - Caroline sub Pierre
CF_Festivals Y2 - Egg Festival - George dead

Entries.Evelyn: It might be a bit gluttonous of me, but some years, when I'm particularly worn-out, it's the free food that motivates me to be here.$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Egg Festival - JasVince18

Entries.Penny: Me and my old students got together for an art project, for old time's sake. We painted the eggs this year.$h#$b#If you see a purple one, it might be Jas', and one of the yellow ones is Vincent's.
Entries.Willy: The young ones of this town don't care too much for what I spend most of my time doing. And that's fine.#$b#Helping out with this event helps me connect with them a little, even if indirectly.$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Egg Festival - Emily dead

Entries.Jodi: It seems like people really put their heart and soul into this festival.$h#$e#Maybe I should join next time, too.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Egg Festival - Lewis

Entries.Harvey: {{LewisSubF}} is letting me help hide a few eggs this year. I've been scouting some good locations.#$e#Oh, you're participating? Well... who knows? Maybe I won't hide them where you think I will!

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Egg Festival - Vincent dead

Entries.Jas: Maybe I should just team up with one of Magnus' manifests and we can split the prize?#$e#Hmm... maybe not. That's probably not allowed.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Flower Dance - Pierre dead

Entries.Robin: A flower feature can really make the aesthetics of your home come together. Have you seen the crafting recipe that the general store has for sale?

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Flower Dance - Demetrius dead

Entries.Maru: I wonder if my anyone's going to be videotaping this?#$b#I guess they can if they want. I'm not too camera-shy.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Flower Dance - George dead

Entries.Evelyn: Some years it's hard to walk all the way over here... but it's certainly worth it!$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Flower Dance - Lewis sub

Entries.Pam: Heh heh. {{LewisSubF}} can't help but keep an open wine bar at this event. It's tradition, after all!$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Flower Dance - Haley dead

Entries.Emily: It's good to see everyone happy. I do my best to help make this day special.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Flower Dance - Elliott dead

Entries.Leah: Hey @. Don't mind me. I was just debating aesthetics again.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Flower Dance - Penny dead

Entries.Jas: See this dress? It used to be Miss Penny's... she gave it to me! It's so pretty!$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Luau - Lewis sub

Entries.Governor: Ah yes, the natural beauty here is lovely, {{LewisSubS}}, but campaigning for Stardew Valley as a tourist destination remains to be decided.#$e#Do tell me about the annual fall fair. Can we expect it to be filled with delicious cuisine?
Entries.Penny: I have to admit it's a bit fun to watch {{LewisSubF}}'s different facial expressions throughout the day.$h#$e#I hope his conversation with the governor goes well.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Luau - Linus dead

Entries.Maru: Mmm, I'm saving room for the roast. Looks like it's just about done.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Luau - Sam dead

Entries.Sebastian: If the soup turns out terrible, I'm sure I'll still end up eating it.#$b#Some days I'm just *that* hungry.$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Luau - Emily dead

Entries.Haley: *giggle* They look so cute, dancing like that.
Entries.Harvey: Did you know that sometimes people start dancing, literally can't stop, and then keep going until they get so tired that they pass out?#$b#Granted, that's usually some form of mass hysteria or nocebo, but still, make sure to take breaks and drink a lot of water!$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Luau - Penny dead

Entries.Sam: The anchovies thing was just one year. I promise I won't put anything gross in the soup.#$b#*psst* You, on the other hand, @...$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Luau - Leah dead

Entries.Elliott: I didn't forget about the Luau this year!$h#$e#Well, the noise woke me up, anyway. That helped.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Luau - JasVince18

Entries.Jas: Maybe some slower music would work better...$h
Entries.Vincent: Hey! Maybe we should change the music... that'd make it more fun.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Dance of the Moonlight Jellies - Pierre dead

Entries.Caroline: I try my best to keep a balance between the time I spend at the stall and the time I spend celebrating.#$b#Pierre was never good at that...$s#$b#But that's all the more reason for me to be better.$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Dance of the Moonlight Jellies - Kent dead

Entries.Jodi: Despite losing some things, I try to remember what I still have.#$b#I can still remember Kent... and that might not always be true as I keep getting older. So I have to hang onto those memories.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Stardew Valley Fair - Leah dead

Entries.Robin: It's nice working on a sculpture like this. Reminds me of Leah.$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Stardew Valley Fair - Pierre dead

Entries.Caroline: The grange display always meant a lot to Pierre, but I try not to let it stress me out.#$b#At the end of the day, whatever happens, we're still the general store no matter what.$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Stardew Valley Fair - George dead

Entries.Evelyn: Harvey told me I need to watch my cholesterol... such a shame.$s#$b#...#$b#...#$b#I suppose... just one couldn't hurt.$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Stardew Valley Fair - Marlon dead

Entries.Clint: I know you're familiar with my work on your own tools, but if you want a little more reassurance, take a close look at these.$h#$e#Magnus sells my weapons at the adventurer's guild, in case I haven't told you.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Stardew Valley Fair - Haley dead

Entries.Emily: It's cute how invested people get in the fortune teller. I think I can claim credit for that one.#$e#Well, we can all use a little something to look forward to.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Stardew Valley Fair - Robin dead

Entries.Leah: Hanging out at this display really brings back good memories of Robin.$h#$e#Sometimes I miss being her student...$s

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Stardew Valley Fair - Marnie sub

Entries.Shane: {{MarnieSub}} put me in charge of the petting zoo. Go ahead. Give 'em a pet.#$e#Hey, if you wanna take one home, you know the system: ask {{MarnieSub}}.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Stardew Valley Fair - Sam dead

Entries.Vincent: Dang, every year I wanna ride them!#$e#I could probably just... hop right over...#$e#Ugh... no, no, I can't.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Spirit's Eve - Marlon dead

Entries.Clint: I'm reasonably aware... if it's Magnus who's brought these monsters, they're probably the real deal.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Spirit's Eve - JasVince13

Entries.Jodi: I think the only reason Vincent's always been so insistent on going into the maze is because Sam makes it look so easy...$s#$b#I don't know if he knows what he's getting into, but... this year, I decided he's old enough to go accompanied. He'll be taking Jas with him.$n
Entries.Jas: Vincy, you know that monsters aren't real, right? Come on, let's get moving.
Entries.Vincent: Mmm... give me a minute, Jas. I need to 'meditate' like Emily told me to...

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Spirit's Eve - JasVince18

Entries.Jodi: Vincent sure does love that maze... I think he might be even better at navigating it than Sam, now.$h
Entries.Jas: ...Wait, do it with blindfolds on? Vince, are you crazy?$h
Entries.Vincent: What if we went in blind? Like, *literally* blind...$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Festival of Ice - Sebastian dead

Entries.Maru: Sebastian always made some pretty cool snowmen... maybe I could try imitating his style?$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Festival of Ice - Gus dead

Entries.Shane: Two words: Pizza. Festival. Seriously, that needs to happen this year.#$e#It'd be so easy, too. We'd just order a crap-ton of pizzas from the saloon and pass 'em around.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Festival of Ice - Clint/Emily dead

Entries.Clint: This snowman is kind of... awful. It'd be nice if I could get some help.$s
Entries.Emily: Jeez, maybe I could fix this guy up... might be a bit difficult...$s

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Festival of Ice - Willy dead

Entries.Elliott: Willy taught me some fishing tricks a while back. I wonder if he'll be watching me to see if I remembered? Wherever he is, now...#$e#Don't want to let him down.

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Festival of Ice - JasVince18

Entries.Jas: Vincent's a big help with building snowmen. He always puts in his... unique touches.
Entries.Vincent: Agh! Jeez, look at that, @! Cracks, all over the ice...$u#$b#Maybe I stomped a bit too hard, heheh.$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Feast of the Winter Star - Caroline not present

Entries.Abigail: The snow is so pretty, isn't it? I'm really glad it snows as much as it does here.$h#$b#Hey, speaking of which, wanna hear a little secret?#$b#One time, a few years ago, I caught my mom making snow angels out here, smiling and laughing like a schoolgirl.$h#$b#Don't tell anyone, okay?

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Feast of the Winter Star - Robin dead

Entries.Maru: Mmm... glad I got the table with the green stuff on it.$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Feast of the Winter Star - Pierre dead

Entries.Caroline: Mmm... huh? Yes, @? Anything you... need?$h#$b#Sorry, I'm two drinks deep right now. What can I say? I love this holiday.$h#$b#...#$b#Hey, has anyone ever told you that you look really handsome?$h^Hey, has anyone ever told you that you look really pretty?$l

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Feast of the Winter Star - Kent dead

Entries.Jodi: Here, @. Why don't you eat the rest of what's on my plate? I'm positively stuffed!$h
Entries.Sam: I'm thankful that everyone can get together today.#$b#As much as some of the people in this town are a bit lame, I like having a sense of community, y'know?$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Feast of the Winter Star - Gus dead

Entries.Leah: Joining my table for a little while? Here. Have some nog.$h

Changes.LogName: CF_Festivals Y2 - Feast of the Winter Star - JasVince13

Entries.Jas: I got here early and started eating... is that rude?#$b#Mmm... I'm sure nobody noticed.$h
Entries.Vincent: I'm really excited! This is my favorite holiday, no contest!$h
